Card Text: If you're here, there's been an error.
Left hover text: Close the game and bugfix genius

Card Name: Rosaline, Head of Recruitment & Platonic Friendship Manipulation.
Card Text: Hey Chief, I am SO glad you’re taking over because the last guy didn’t give a honk about us at all. What do I mean by that? Well! For the past THREE months, someone’s been stealing our lunches out of the communal fridge. THREE months. You have to do something about this, PLEASE!
Left hover text: Hire armed security guards to protect everyone’s lunch bags!
Right hover text: Ban everyone from bringing their own lunches.

Card Text: Hiring armed security guards cost a lot of money, but the cult members rally around the decision because FINALLY someone took their complaints seriously!

Cult members grumble at the fact that they can no longer bring their own lunch to work and must rely on Mabel St. Claire’s “Mystery Meat” for their lunches. But hey, the thief can’t steal what’s not there, right?

Card Name: Charles, Head of Viral Dance Infection
Card Text: YOOOO! Have you SEEN this new VIRAL trend that’s been going around on YikYak right now? If you haven’t I’ve attached a gif of what I’m talking about. We TOTALLY need to get people on board with this trend and, like, we need to do it SOON!

Card Name: Charles, Head of Viral Dance Infection
Card Text: This will TOTALLY make us go viral and we’ll get SO MANY new followers! Rosaline agrees, by the way.

Card Name: Mad Madz, Head of Research and Development.
Card Text: If you approve Charles' fucking ticket, I will poison the water system giving everyone diarrhea, and Simon will bomb the bathrooms. This is a promise, not a threat.
I like the idea of us going viral. You should approve Charles’s idea.
You decide a poop-implosion isn’t worth the YikYak fame. Your fellow cult members thank you for your wise decision. You also find out that no one wanted to do the silly YikYak dance to begin with.

Who cares if Mad Madz is threatening to create a poop-implosion? This is INTERNET FAME AND VIRALITY! You gather a bunch of grumbling cult members and have Charles lead them straight to the front page of YikYak! You have SO MANY NEW FOLLOWERS NOW!

Unfortunately, Mad Madz follows through with her threat as she poisons the waterways. Cult members call out sick. Meanwhile, Simon does indeed blow up the bathrooms. Or rather, two bathrooms. Your bathroom at work, and your bathroom at home.
When you try to bring their behavior up to the Bossman, he just laughs and tells you to give Mad Madz and Simon a raise.

Card Name: Simon Says, Head of Defense & Strategy
Card Text: Hey, we found the quarry that the Rowdy Roughers have been getting all their ore from. We should bomb the heck out of it and claim it for ourselves. Mad Madz, the Head of R&D, agrees with me. Rosaline is gonna tell you that we should, ugh, make friends with them. That’s stupid. We NEED to assert our dominance.
Left hover text: Agree with Simon and Mad Madz

Card Text: You bomb the Rowdy Roughers with great success - flattening their operations and successfully taking over the quarry. Morale is at an all-time high as your notoriety soars!

You decide to try and make friends with the Rowdy Roughers. Things are a little rough at first, however, the both of you find yourselves in a tentative alliance thanks to Rosaline’s syrup-sweet disposition.
As you finish filing away the last of your complaints, you feel like you did a good job for your first day.
Later that night, you drift off to sleep, expecting nothing but good dreams and a good rest.
